# Anagh K R â€” Portfolio

## Overview
Anagh K R is a freelance Full-Stack Developer and Flutter Developer based in Kerala, India.
He builds high-performance web and mobile applications using the MERN stack and Flutter.

## Primary Services
- Web Development: Custom websites, web applications, and e-commerce platforms with React, Next.js, and Node.js.
- WordPress Development: Business websites, landing pages, blogs, and custom WordPress solutions.
- Mobile App Development: Cross-platform iOS and Android apps using Flutter.
- UI/UX Design: Modern, responsive interface design focused on usability.
- SEO & Optimization: Site performance improvements and search engine optimization.
- Technical Consultation: Guidance on architecture and technology stack decisions.

## Core Technologies
- Frontend: React, Next.js
- Backend: Node.js, Express.js
- Database: MongoDB
- Mobile: Flutter
- CMS: WordPress
- Full Stack: MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js)

## Service Area
Clients served across Kerala, including:
- WordPress development services are available in every location listed below.
- Kochi
- Thiruvananthapuram
- Kozhikode (Calicut)
- Thrissur
- Kannur
- Kollam
- Kasaragod
- Palakkad
- Ernakulam
- Kanhangad
